Html:
Hi, need urgent help with Vancouver citations. Need to:

*Remove parenthesis in the superscript text citation (already used macro to change to superscript)
*Remove the "p." that appears before page numbers in the citations.

Would it be possible? Many thanks in advance!
Ana

AMH wrote:
*Remove parenthesis in the superscript text citation (already used macro to change to superscript)
Just remove the content of the openbracket and closebracket elements.
<openbracket></openbracket>
<closebracket></closebracket>
AMH wrote:
*Remove the "p." that appears before page numbers in the citations.
Just change the format strings under the citations element. For more info on format strings, see here.

Many thanks for info & fast reply!
It works and it was a lot easier to do than expected, since I have no experience at all editing styles.
Hope my tutor doesn't ask for more format citing changes to finalise my Masther thesis.
Thanks again!
Ana
